content: @Shnatsel About https://github.com/rust-secure-code/safety-dance/pull/26, what's the criterion for naming people here? Because the initial PR to remove all unsafety for 0.22 was done by https://github.com/fintelia. My role was more of a maintainer hence the fixing PR is co-authored by me and did the impact post mortems. It was afterwards that I was stubborn enough to backport them to 0.21.
I try to name everyone involved in the cleanup efforts so that nobody is upset :D
I recall you opening https://github.com/image-rs/image/pull/985 so I've added you

Ah, well that was a rebase of the original large scale cleanup PR: https://github.com/image-rs/image/pull/887
It was split into three parts (#985 being the third and final one) to make reviewing and backporting easier.
I see, thanks for the clarification! I guess I'll ping fintelia on the PR and ask if they'd prefer to be credited as part of safety-dance or separately.
